name: So I'm the second girl to be summoned to this world?
name_original: So I'm the second girl to be summoned to this world?
description:
This whole project was part of Game jam that lasted for 19 days. First time trying to create a 3D RPG, turned out pretty good. My goal was only to use Unity assets that I had bought over the years and create something with it.

This is only version 0.0.1 once the unity assets store summer sale finishes I will probably make a new build with new monsters and more impressive skills.

This version contains one quest, 3 zones, 1 recruitable party member and a few cutscenes.

WASD for movement.
Escape to enter and exit main menu.
